name: Roulette
description: Rules in play are chosen at random.

name: All Open
description: Both decks are placed face up.

name: Three Open
description: Three cards chosen at random from each deck are played face up.

name: Same
description: When a card is played, if two or more of the sides are touching other cards, and the ranks of those sides are identical to those on the sides of the card played, the other cards are flipped.

name: Sudden Death
description: If a match ends in a draw, a new deciding match is played with each player using the cards they captured.

name: Plus
description: When a card is played, if two or more of the sides are touching other cards, and the sum of the ranks on the touching sides are identical to the sums on the other touching sides, the other cards are flipped.

name: Random
description: Decks are chosen at random from each player's list of claimed cards.

name: Order
description: Cards must be played in the order they appear in the deck.

name: Chaos
description: Cards must be played in a random order determined before the match.

name: Fallen Ace
description: A rank 1 side can flip an A. When Reverse is in play, a rank A side will flip a 1.

name: Ascension
description: A card's ranks increase in proportion to the number of cards of the same type already played.

name: Descension
description: A card's ranks decrease in proportion to the number of cards of the same type already played.

name: Swap
description: One random card from each player's deck will be swapped with the other.

name: Draft
description: Decks must be built from a selection of randomly generated cards.
